comments: Professor Tweed is a little tough but this is college after all. She is a great woman who really loves the material she teaches. If you liked to be challenged this is the class for you. If you are a slacker and want an easy A don\'t take. This class really prepares you. I recommend.

Last semester we started with 25 students, after the first research paper, there was only 10 left. We read & analyzed the same 5 stories from start to finish..The last research paper she made it very difficult to finish. WARNING...drop her class..

She is hard if you\'re not into reading and writing! she makes things sound very hard but in reality they\'re easy.. at the beginning of the course you\'re going to read every night for the next 5 classes but then it\'s all writing, DO NOT MISS A SINGLE DAY OF CLASS! you will feel completely lost the next day! she covers a lot in one class.

DO NOT TAKE HER..I REPEAT, DO NOT TAKE HER..she make you sit in class up until the very last minute, & if you leave 15 mins before class is over with, she marks you absent. If you\'re 7-15 mins late,late 3X, or don\'t have your assignment, you\'re absent. she makes the easiest things so very complicated..she also make u do group work to extend time!!!
Alot of writing but you will learn alot and you will pass if you do the work and come to class.attendence is very important.Ms.Tweed is very helpful and nice.
Professor Tweed is great!! She does have a ton of reading but its only like 5 pages in the book. She does help you if you ask and email her with emergencies and everything will be okay!!!
Professor Tweed is great!! She does have a ton of reading but its only like 5 pages in the book. She does help you if you ask and email her with emergencies and everything will be okay!!!
Horrible teacher, she doesn\'t take to time to explain things and could care less if you have emergencies. I would not recommend her to anyone!!

Professor Tweed is great!! She is very helpful and listens!! If you want to pass her class you must attend class. You can mix six classes, but if you do, you will not do the work. The work is quite easy too!!
Great teacher. A lot of writing! Very helpful.
